raw_title: Sendanayaka Kanishka, Beyond the Sunset … Resting in Love –
raw_body:
Sendanayaka Kanishka, Beyond the Sunset … Resting in Love – Basket Ball Coach and Trainer, Elizabeth Moir, Blues Basketball and Iimpact. Dearest son of Marisa De Lima and Podi Bandara Sendanayaka, Precious brother of Kaushalya, much-loved grandson of Rita Margaret Perera, dearest nephew of late Silvana Paul De Lima, Kyle De Lima, Ricardo De Lima, Rosanna Wijayasiriwardena and Pia De Lima and late Madumma Bandara Sendanayaka and Kumari Wijesiri and His remains will lie at THE RESPECT HOME, Borella, from 10.00 a.m., 4th March. The funeral service is at 4.30, and Cortege leaves for burial at 5.30 p.m. to the Roman Catholic Section- General Cemetery, Borella
015656
